verbose_text: Moreover, although IL-1RA entry to the brain is thought to occur primarily when and where the BBB has been breached [XREF_BIBR] we observed similar levels in NBH and ME7 animals arguing against the idea that existing neurodegenerative disease made the brain more permeable to IL-1RA (2) Cytokine and chemokine analysis shows that IL-1RA blocked IL-1 action in the blood but did not prevent LPS induced changes in hippocampal inflammatory transcripts, including de novo IL-1 in the brain.
evidence: IL-1RA blocked IL-1 action in the blood                   but did not prevent LPS
